MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL41 postcode area of Blaenau Ffestiniog, affecting properties in Cromwell Street, Leeds Street and surrounding streets. We are aware of the previous earlier power cut affecting your area and we apologise for this. Our engineers are on site and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:55PM on Saturday 23rd January 2021
